title: ranked mmr should affect normal mmr
body:
i almost never play normals.  pretty much the only time is when a new champ comes out i play a few normal games with them before bringing him into ranked.

so because i play so few normals, my mmr is barely different than when i first hit lvl 30.  this means when i go to practice a new champ im playing with bronze/silver/unranked players, and as a diamond player, i pretty much ruin a game for 5 people, and cant really learn the weaknesses of a champ.

i get why normals dont affect your ranked mmr, but i see no reason why ranked mmr cant have an affect on normals.
